abstract: Police Officer Gregg Benner of Rio Rancho, New Mexico, is shot dead during traffic stop; police have arrested Andrew Romero, known gang member, as suspect in shooting.
lead_paragraph: It was the first time an officer was fatally shot in the line of duty in the Rio Rancho Police Department’s 34-year history.

headline.main: New Mexico: Police Officer Killed During Traffic Stop
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Police Officer Killed During Traffic Stop

snippet: It was the first time an officer was fatally shot in the line of duty in the Rio Rancho Police Department’s 34-year history.
